heroSection.description: An interactive digital menu with modern design, enables your customers to browse the food menu easily and clearly by scanning a QR code only

features.title: Why Choose Smart Menu?
features.description: We provide everything you need to create a professional digital menu for your restaurant or cafe

0.title: Lightning Fast
0.description: Create a professional digital menu for your restaurant in minutes, with instant updates anytime

1.title: Advanced Analytics
1.description: Track your products performance and see the most ordered items to improve your decisions and increase sales

2.title: Mobile Responsive
2.description: Responsive design that works perfectly on all devices - phones, tablets, and computers

3.title: Secure & Protected
3.description: Advanced data protection with automatic backups and world-class security standards

4.title: Multiple Designs
4.description: Choose from a wide range of ready-made templates or customize the design to match your restaurant identity

5.title: Multi-language Support
5.description: Offer menus in multiple languages to customers from different nationalities to expand your customer base

howItWorks.title: Three Simple Steps to Get Started
howItWorks.description: We make it easy for you to transition from your old paper menu to the digital era in minutes.

0.title: Register Now
0.description: Create your account for free in just a few simple steps or sign in directly and quickly using a Google account.

1.title: Customize Your Design
1.description: Choose the colors, logo, and QR style and menu that matches your restaurant's brand identity.

2.title: Publish the QR Code
2.description: Upload the QR code in high quality and print it on the tables or at the entrance of your restaurant.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about ENS platform in one place.

items.question: How do I update my menu?
items.answer: Through your dashboard, you can modify items, prices, and images with a click of a button, and the change will appear instantly to your customers without needing to change the printed QR code.

items.question: Do I need a crypto wallet to use the service?
items.answer: No, you can register via email or Google account and start directly. We provide traditional payment options in addition to crypto options.

items.question: What is a smart menu?
items.answer: It is an interactive menu that allows your customers to browse meals, view item ratings, and even order directly from the table via their phone.

items.question: Can I link the QR to an external website?
items.answer: Absolutely! You can direct the QR to any external link, or use our integrated and professional menu system.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Restaurant?
cta.description: Join hundreds of restaurants that switched to smart menus. Start your free trial today.

footer.description: ENS provides you with the best digital menu solutions for restaurants and cafes through QR codes to receive orders and payments from your customers for a seamless and convenient experience, contributing to increasing customer satisfaction and boosting sales.

settingsDesignPage.title: Menu design
settingsDesignPage.subtitle: Choose the template that best fits how you want your menu to look. You can change it at any time.

cards.defaultHelper: Recommended default template for most users
cards.templateHelper: Ready-made template with a professional design
cards.templateNotActive: This template is not active. Please activate it to customize it.

tips.title: Helpful tips
tips.tip1: You can change the template at any time without affecting your items or prices.
tips.tip2: Some templates include different layouts for images, headings, and sections.
tips.tip3: Try multiple templates to see which one best matches your restaurant’s branding.

settingsDesignTemplatePage.title: Customize template {name}
settingsDesignTemplatePage.description: Fine-tune this template’s colors and hero texts so your digital menu perfectly matches your restaurant’s visual identity.

notEditable.title: This template cannot be customized
notEditable.description: You can go back to the design page and choose another template that supports advanced customization.

preview.currentColorsDescription: These colors are applied to key buttons, gradients, and highlight elements across your menu.
preview.footerNote: This preview reflects how your main menu page will look after applying the new colors and texts.

readyColors.title: Start from a curated color palette
readyColors.description: Pick a ready-made palette that fits your brand, then adjust the exact shades in the custom colors section.

customColors.title: Match the template to your brand colors
customColors.description: Set your main brand and accent colors. They’ll be used for gradients, CTAs, and important UI elements.
customColors.pickerLabel: Use the color picker to choose an exact shade.

texts.title: Edit the hero texts that appear in the template
texts.description: These titles and descriptions can be used in the hero section and highlight cards inside your live menu.
texts.helperShortAr: Keep it short and clear for Arabic visitors.
texts.helperShortEn: This text will appear for visitors using English.

toast.fakeSave: Template customization will be connected to your live menu soon. For now, this page lets you explore and preview different designs.

socialLinks.title: Social media links
socialLinks.note: These links will be displayed on your site. You can remove any row at any time to control what is shown to customers.

businessHours.title: Business hours
businessHours.note: Set your business hours. Check «Closed» if the store is closed on that day.
